entities: International Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia
summary:
The Security Council,

Recalling its previous resolutions on the International Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia, 
Noting the delay in delivering the judgment in the Popović case, 
Decides that the total number of ad litem judges may temporarily exceed the maximum of twelve to thirteen at any one time, 
This temporary increase to last until 30 June 2010 or upon completion of the Popović case if sooner,
 Urges the International Tribunal to complete its work expeditiously, 
Decides to remain seized of the matter.
